function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased connectivity and communication may lead to faster propagation of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Uncontrolled spread of contagious diseases, leading to public health crises and strain on healthcare systems.","Mitigation":"Implement strict public health measures, such as hygiene and sanitation protocols, and invest in early detection and response systems for infectious diseases.","Technologies":"IoT monitoring and early warning systems, AI-driven disease surveillance, and contact tracing technologies.","People":"General public, healthcare workers, and urban residents.","Owner":"Health authorities, city governments, and technology companies."}]}
